events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our recruitment team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
We completed your initial screening call, and our team is impressed with your experience in software development and devops.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th, where you'll meet with our senior engineers to discuss your development skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and excellent coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th to discuss your fit within the company culture and benefits.
You had the HR interview where they discussed company values, work environment, and answered your questions thoroughly.
We are delighted to propose you an offer for the position of Software Engineer with competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You formally accepted the job offer, confirming your start date and looking forward to contributing as a key developer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including system access setup, introductions to the engineering team, and initial training.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and officially closed with you joining as a Software Engineer.
